# Pull Request

Thanks for contributing!

If you want a more specific template, you can use one of:

- `?template=feature.md`
- `?template=bugfix.md`
- `?template=docs.md`

(These live in `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/`.)

## Summary

Describe what this PR changes and why.

## Related Issues

- Fixes #
- Related #

## Validation

Describe how you validated the change:

- [ ] Script compiles in TradingView (Pine Script v6)
- [ ] Tested on multiple symbols
- [ ] Tested on multiple timeframes
- [ ] Checked behavior on historical + realtime bars (and Bar Replay if relevant)

## Screenshots / Examples

If the change affects visuals or inputs, include screenshots (before/after) or a short clip.

## Checklist

- [ ] No secrets, personal data, or phishing links added
- [ ] No intentional obfuscation
- [ ] Any new/changed inputs have clear names, defaults, and tooltips
- [ ] Docs updated if behavior/UI changed (README, images, etc.)
- [ ] If security-sensitive, followed `SECURITY.md` (no public disclosure)
